original_summary: Tom Hanks phones to order a dozen red carnations for his mother and then pays for them with #Person2#'s assistance.

transformed_conversations.personal_summary:
Here's a summary of your interactions with Tom Hanks regarding his mother's flower delivery, Shareen. It all started about a month and a half ago on June 1st when Tom first called to place an order for a dozen long-stem red carnations to be delivered to his mother's apartment on June 17th. You took down all the details and processed his Visa payment. 

The delivery went smoothly and his mother loved the flowers. Tom called back the next week to thank you personally. Then in early July, about two weeks ago, Tom reached out again wanting to send another bouquet for his mother's birthday on July 30th. This time he requested an assortment of summer flowers in bright colors.

Last week, you followed up with Tom to confirm the birthday flower delivery details. Everything was on track. Then yesterday, Tom's assistant Angela called to add a box of gourmet chocolates to the birthday order. She said Tom wanted to make sure this birthday was extra special.

So in summary, over the past month and a half you've helped Tom send two lovely flower arrangements to brighten his mother's day - carnations in mid-June, and a colorful summer bouquet with chocolates for her late July birthday. Your attention to detail and personal customer service have made Tom a very satisfied loyal customer. Great job, Shareen!

messages.content: You: Hello, Sunshine Flower Shop. This is Shareen speaking.
Tom Hanks: This is Tom Hanks. I'd like to order some flowers for my mother and have them sent to her apartment.
You: Fine, Mr. Hanks. What kind of flowers do you want?
Tom Hanks: I'd like to send a dozen red carnations.
You: A dozen red carnations? Our long stem red carnations are selling for 12 pounds a dozen this weekend. They are really quite nice.
Tom Hanks: Alright then, I'll take those.
You: I need your complete address, Mr. Hanks.
Tom Hanks: The address is number 84 MW Street. For the card, just write something simple. How about 'dear mom, all my love, Tom'?
You: Of course. OK, when should they arrive?
Tom Hanks: They should be there before 5 o'clock in the afternoon on June seventeenth. My mom's telephone number is 8456086363. Please call her first before you deliver them.
You: That should be no problem. Just one more question, Mr. Hanks. How do you intend to pay for it?
Tom Hanks: You can put it on my visa card. The number is KH 3272645.
You: Got it. Bye.
Tom Hanks: Bye, thanks.

Tom Hanks: Hi Shareen, this is Tom Hanks again. I just wanted to thank you for the wonderful carnations you sent to my mother last week. She absolutely loved them and couldn't stop raving about how beautiful and fresh they were.
You: I'm so glad to hear that, Mr. Hanks! We take great pride in the quality of our flowers. I'll be sure to pass your compliments along to our team.
Tom Hanks: Wonderful. You can expect more orders from me in the future. My mom's birthday is coming up next month and I'll definitely be sending her something special from your shop.
You: That's great, we'll be happy to assist you again. Feel free to call or stop by anytime. Have a wonderful day!
Tom Hanks: Hi Shareen, I'd like to place another order for my mom's birthday on July 30th.
You: Hello Mr. Hanks, we'd be delighted to help. What did you have in mind for this special occasion?
Tom Hanks: I was thinking an assortment of colorful summer flowers this time, something cheerful and bright. Can you make some recommendations? Budget is flexible.

You: Absolutely. We have some stunning summer arrangements featuring yellow sunflowers, orange lilies, pink gerbera daisies and purple asters. I can send you some photos of our most popular options if you'd like.

Tom Hanks: That would be perfect, thank you. Also, can we schedule the delivery for the 30th, around noon? And please include a card that says "Happy Birthday Mom! Wishing you a day as wonderful as you are. Love always, Tom"
You: Consider it done. I'll email you the photos and arrangement options by tomorrow. We'll take care of everything for a noon delivery on the 30th.
Tom Hanks: You're the best, Shareen. I know I can always count on you and Sunshine Flower Shop. Talk soon!
You: Good morning Mr. Hanks, I just wanted to follow up on the birthday flower arrangements for your mother. Did you have a chance to look at the options I emailed you last week?
Tom Hanks: Yes I did, thank you Shareen. The Summer Spectacular Bouquet really caught my eye - such vibrant colors. Let's go with that one.
You: Excellent choice. I'll get that order processed for you right away. Delivery is still set for noon on July 30th to the same address, correct?
Tom Hanks: Yes, that's right. I appreciate you double checking all the details. You always provide such thoughtful service.
You: It's my pleasure, Mr. Hanks. Our top priority is making sure every order is perfect. I'll send you a confirmation email shortly. Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist with.
Tom Hanks: Will do, thanks again Shareen. I'm sure my mom will be thrilled. Have a great rest of your day!
Angela Roberts: Hi, this message is for Shareen. I'm Angela, Tom Hanks' assistant. He asked me to get in touch with you.
You: Hi Angela, thanks for reaching out. How can I help you and Mr. Hanks today?

Angela Roberts: Tom would like to add a box of gourmet chocolates to the birthday order you have scheduled for his mother on the 30th. He wants to make sure this birthday is extra special for her. Can you arrange that?
You: Of course, we'd be happy to include a box of chocolates. We partner with a wonderful local chocolatier. How does a 20-piece assortment of their finest milk and dark chocolate truffles sound?
Angela Roberts: That sounds perfect. Tom will be thrilled. You've been so wonderful to work with, Shareen. Tom sings your praises all the time!

You: That's so kind of him, and you! I'm touched. We love having him as a customer. I'll add the chocolates to the order and we'll make sure everything is delivered beautifully packaged and presented.
Angela Roberts: Fantastic, I'll let Tom know. He'll be so pleased. I'm sure we'll be in touch again soon. Take care!
You: Sounds great, Angela. I look forward to our next conversation. Have a wonderful day!
